title: Anyone know what time we get our rewards?

replies.body:
It tells you in the article, in the FAQ section.
Just try browsing through them and seeing which one tells you.

> [{quoted}](name=KMKaos,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=J1IE1BW0,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-06-22T08:09:33.620+0000)
>
> It tells you in the article, in the FAQ section.
> Just try browsing through them and seeing which one tells you. 
Can you screenshot it with like a circle around it? i was browsing on the Forums/S@20/articles/redposts

EDIT: I am having internet problems so its either not loading or not there.
Pretty sure it's 1st of July for mystery skin, 28th of June for the rest, this is off the top of my head though

> [{quoted}](name=Gummyjacob,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=J1IE1BW0,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-06-22T08:44:24.763+0000)
>
> Pretty sure it's 1st of July for mystery skin, 28th of June for the rest, this is off the top of my head though

Remember, this is in Riot Standard Time.

> [{quoted}](name=Gummyjacob,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=J1IE1BW0,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-06-22T08:44:24.763+0000)
>
> Pretty sure it's 1st of July for mystery skin, 28th of June for the rest, this is off the top of my head though

ugh that sucks, ty tho
some time in the year 2017 I believe.
RITO DON'T MAKE ME WAIT PLZ!!!!
